short_summary: The Canadian Grain Commission requires a third-party supplier to provide one Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer (ICP-MS) system.
description: The ICP-MS system must be capable of analyzing elements ranging from ppm to ppb concentration levels. The contractor shall deliver the system with specifications as per Annex Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria.
duration_in_months: When the contract is awarded, the estimated contract duration will be approximately 2-4 months.
full_summary:
## Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer Tender Notice

### Notice Information

**Reference Number**: WS3784440799-Doc3784488688
**Amendment Number**: 8
**Publication Date**: December 17, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: January 31, 2023 at 02:00 PM EST

### Tender Overview

The Government of Canada's Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Grain Commission (CGC) is soliciting proposals for the supply, delivery, installation, and training of one (1) Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometer (ICP-MS) system.

### Tender Details

The successful Contractor must deliver a benchtop ICP-MS system capable of analyzing elements at concentrations ranging from ppm to ppb. The system must include an ESI 8DX prepFAST M5 and TuneSelect. The Contractor is required to meet the specifications outlined in the Mandatory Technical Evaluation Criteria (available in Annex).

### Evaluation Criteria

The Procurement will be evaluated based on a Combination of Technical Merit and Price. The highest Combined Rating will be awarded the contract.

### Excluded Tender Proposal Types

This Procurement is open to competitive bids. All interested Contractors are invited to submit their proposals.

### Trade Agreements

This Tender is subject to various Trade Agreements including, but not limited to, the Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

### Tender Receipt

Proposals must be received by January 31, 2023, before 02:00 PM EST. Any proposals received after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

The Contracting Officer may be contacted as follows:

Name: 	Zumbado Diaz, Willy (SPAC/PSPC)
Email:	willy.zumbadodiaz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
URL:	http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14918581?extsite=MTQ5MTg1ODFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### End User Entities

The End User Entities are:

Name: 	Canadian Grain Commission (CGC)
Address: 	303 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba, R3C 3G8, Canada

The provided request is subject to the changes/amendments made. Upon its request,
